data.text: @mikekeencooks Hi mikekeencooks, I am sorry to hear that, you can ask the chat bot to connect you to a live agent, if you use Facebook, you can also contact us on Facebook Messenger as well so that we can assist you further. Best regards, Rebecka

@mikekeencooks Hi Mikekeencooks! We are able to assist you with changing your details over chat or if you call our support. https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj - You will find our chat and our phone numbers by selecting your region and then click on Customer Service / Eurobonus. 
Best regards, Rebecka

data.text:
@APxx77 Hi APxx77!
I'm terribly sorry that you have not received your refund. We are more than happy to help you through chat or phone: https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj - Select your region and click on Customer Service / Eurobonus to see our phone numbers. Best regards, Rebecka

data.text: @Luis_MC_Cardona Hi Luis! I am terribly sorry about the delays and cancellations you experienced. Please contact our customer care so that we can assist you in the best possible way. https://t.co/wprQ9Zejqh  Best regards, Rebecka

data.text:
@london_limited Hi,

There is no limit how many times a ticket can be rebooked up to 72 hours before departure.

Regards,
Peter

@AsaBertze Yes that is correct, you can only change the date and time for a trip but not the start/destination. You can change travelers against a cost as long as the flights are only operated by us. Yes if you have a voucher then you can book a whole new trip.

//Best regards, Dennis.

urls.title: EU Passenger Rights
urls.description: Regulations regarding passenger rights in case of any delays, canceled flights and/or denied boarding. If your flight has been canceled or significantly delayed or if you have been denied boarding on a flight for which you have a confirmed reservation, you are entitled to the rights defined in Regulation (EC) No 261/2004, which entered into force on 17/02/2005. The airline on whose flight the disruption occurs is responsible for granting your rights. Visit eur-lex.europa.eu for more about EU 261/2004

urls.title: Home - SAS

data.text: @peterfalck1 Ignore it this is for testing
@MaxWilson1001 Hi Max, it you want to fly from London to Bergen you have to change flight in Oslo. Wish you a nice day! //Regards, Petra

@C_Meiczinger Hej Christian! Tack för din fråga! Vi kommer inte att traffikera med SAS flygningar till Syafrika i sommar. Dock har vi flera Star Alliance partners som kan ta dig till dina drömmar! Ha en bra dag! / Alice
@robin_daniels Hi Robin! I am sorry about that! We are unable to assist with bookings over Twitter but please contact us via Facebook Messenger and we will take a look. Kind regards, Alice

We happily announce a new agreement with @CFM_engines for LEAP-1A engines for 35 of our A320neo family aircraft. 

As part of our fleet upgrade program, aiming to improve efficiency and sustainability performances, the engines will power our new fleet into the future✈️

#flysas https://t.co/yooeyIFZ0d

@TonyLebon Hi Tony! Vouchers received as a refund for flights canceled due to COVID-19 are refundable after 12 months. Please contact us via phone/Facebook Messenger if you have questions regarding your specific voucher and we will help you from there. Kind regards, Alice

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text: @RitaMil04502999 Have you filed a complaint to our Customer Care? Do you have a Case-ID number?
@maritza23631525 Hi! The Customer Service for the mentioned offices are open 09.00–17.00 CET. Kind regards, Alice
@maritza23631525 Hello Maritza! Which of the numbers are you trying to call? Kind regards, Alice
@cut_olo Thanks

@cut_olo Hi. Thank you for the information. What market are you on and what e-mail is it? 
It would help alot if you could visit https://t.co/0nJ7HSdQlt and there explain what route you took etc to get there. Then our devs can look at it. //JH

With joy we see demand for air travel increasing during the spring and summer. Assuming travel restrictions have eased, we will open 180 direct routes from Scandinavia to Europe. We also launch a few new destinations. Find out which ones at https://t.co/xofyIW3JLX 💙

#flysas https://t.co/4DaM9XQRIi

data.text: @HibbyRon I am sorry but I can only ask you to try contacting them again.
@HibbyRon Ask them to contact SAS Agent Support/Helpdesk through their channels and they will have all information needed.
@HibbyRon Hi! As far as I can see the ticket in this booking was fully refunded on the 6th of November.
@gsurya I am sorry for that. This is most probably a semi-translation that has gone wrong and I will report it to our technicians.
@gsurya If you have been charged for something you have not purchased, please send a claim to our Customer Care and they will investigate: https://t.co/wprQ9Zejqh

data.text: @dsfrederik It looks as if this flight is fully booked.

We have now extended our partnership with Apollo in a record-breaking contract – worth around SEK 3.4 bn over the first three years it represents our largest contract with a charter operator, and a long-standing partnership that we are incredibly proud of💙

#flysas #apollo https://t.co/lEsU8oU4ek
@CiaraCarey14 Hello Clara! We're so happy to hear this, thank you for taking the time to share it with us! We will do our best to pass your feedback on!😊 Have a wonderful day! Kind regards, Alice

@KitsuneCysh It should say that the voucher is refundable after 12 month. If  you've bought new tickets and paid with the voucher and these new tickets get cancelled due to the pandemic then that flight will be handled like a new flight being cancelled. //JH

data.text: @ThomasWavrant Hi. Please contact our Sales Office via phone and they can look at what kind of tickets you had and check what is correct regarding refunds of such tickets.

@needymegan Hello! I am afraid we can not check specific refund statuses over social media. Kindly contact us via phone or through the Facebook Messenger chat and we will help you further from there. Have a nice day! Kind regards, Alice

data.text: @JainHemendra Hello Hemendra! If you are a Travel Agent you must contact our Agent Support for information and assistance regarding these tickets. Kind regards, Alice
@RiittaSallakivi Hi Ritta, I have no information when you will receive an answer. What I can do from here is to send a reminder to them so I will do that. Wish you a nice Sunday! //Regards, Petra
@FabriceRiviere1 great!
@FabriceRiviere1 just enter anything there it doesn't matter ..for example payment error
@Lilohen Jag har inte någon information om att det kommer att bli ytterligare ändringar just nu. Blir det aktuellt så meddelar vi dig på nytt. //Vänliga hälsningar Petra

@FabriceRiviere1 Hi Fabrice, please send your booking reference regarding voucher request in enclosed link and we will check it up. Mention that you have been sent from twitter. //Brgds Petra https://t.co/0nJ7HSdQlt

data.text:
@Lilohen Hej. Det är inget vi kan svara på här. Du kan ta kontakt med Kundservice  via telefon eller chat så kan de undersöka vad som gäller i ditt tillfälle. 
Så prova där och se vad som gäller för just dina biljetter.
@ivarbt Hello Ivar! The government is right, if you are a Norwegian citizen you do not have to present a test certificate for travels to Norway. Trevlig resa! Kind regards, Alice

@OlenkaSmalls Hi, thanks for contacting us. There is still restrictions from UK. I enclose a link to our website where you can find information under Pet exceptions. As soon as the information changes it will be updated on our website.Have a great evening. Regards Anki
https://t.co/3gok299F3A

@Sweetweetangel I can see that your refund has not yet been performed and is still in queue. Due to the many cancellations starting in the spring, the processing time for refunds is much longer than normal.  I cannot estimate when your refund will be processed, and apologizes for the delay.

@Abuyous98278496 Hello! I'm sorry for the inconvenience! If you have questions regarding your refund I suggest that you contact our Customer Service via phone or Facebook Messenger. Kindly see the following link which has all of our numbers. https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj Kind regards, Alice

data.text: @keshaav Hi. Please visit our website and scroll down to the bottom and choose contact. There then type "chat" in the automatic chat help and you will be given the option to chat with out Sales office. They can then help you checking this out. // JH
@lovesRyan123 Ok. You can visit our website and type "error" in the search field and there in the error reporting form explain what happened and they can forward the information for you. //JH
@SirpaSisko Visit https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj and write chat in the Turi window. Then you can give the Sales Office personnel booking reference etc and they can then look into it. //JH
